# Tools

## nmap: network scanner

https://isc.sans.edu/diary/How+to+Find+Hidden+Cameras+in+your+AirBNB/24834

``` bash
nmap -Ap 80,8000,8080,443,8443,7443,7070,7000,22,23,21 10.5.1.0/24
``` 

## hub: github cli

https://hub.github.com/

Authorization:

Create a github token and put it into environment variable: `GITHUB_TOKEN`

Debug a command:

``` bash
env HUB_VERBOSE=1 hub ...
``` 

Create a new repo:

``` bash
hub create
```

## broot: cli replacement for ls and tree

https://dystroy.org/broot/documentation/installation/

``` bash
cargo install broot
``` 

### Verbs

`Space` then `verb`

		edit
		create
		view


### Customizing Configuration

https://dystroy.org/broot/documentation/configuration/

`/Users/mertnuhoglu/Library/Preferences/org.dystroy.broot/conf.toml`

``` bash
mkdir -p /Users/mertnuhoglu/projects/private_dotfiles/broot
mv /Users/mertnuhoglu/Library/Preferences/org.dystroy.broot/conf.toml /Users/mertnuhoglu/projects/private_dotfiles/broot
ln -s /Users/mertnuhoglu/projects/private_dotfiles/broot/conf.toml /Users/mertnuhoglu/Library/Preferences/org.dystroy.broot/conf.toml
``` 

### Tricks

Deep fuzzy cd

``` bash
~/projects/study master*
$ dcd brave

~/projects/study/clj/ex/study_clojure/book_clojure_brave master*
``` 

### Usage

Regex

``` bash
/pattern
/pattern/i
``` 

Toggles

``` bash
:sizes
:perm
:h # hidden files
:gi # use .gitignore
:files # just folders
``` 

Quitting

``` bash
^q
:q
```

## httpie: curl alternative

``` bash
$ tldr http
http

HTTPie: HTTP client, a user-friendly cURL replacement.
More information: <https://httpie.org>.

- Download a URL to a file:
  http -d example.org

- Send form-encoded data:
  http -f example.org name='bob' profile_picture@'bob.png'

- Send JSON object:
  http example.org name='bob'

- Specify an HTTP method:
  http HEAD example.org

- Include an extra header:
  http example.org X-MyHeader:123

- Pass a user name and password for server authentication:
  http -a username:password example.org

- Specify raw request body via `stdin`:
  cat data.txt | http PUT example.org
```
